page.title: 16Local News
page.content:
Four Primary 7 pupils who entered the 84/85 Mathematical Project Competition for primary schools run by the Scottish Mathematical Council won the certificate of Honourable Merit and will be going to Edinburgh on Friday to receive their awards.
A party of 27 primary 7 children returned from York this week and Primary 6 are going on a trip to Edinburgh.
There is a dispute between Angus District Council and Tayside Regional Council about which route the Montrose Inner Relief Road should take. Montrose Community Council are to confirm their support for the relief road as proposed by MIRRAC (Montrose Inner Relief Road Action Community).
